# NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorInvalidParameterLength

**Case**

The length of an input parameter is invalid.

## Declaration

```swift
case readerErrorInvalidParameterLength
```

## Other Errors

- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorUnsupportedFeature**: The reader session does not support this feature.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorInvalidParameter**: An input parameter is invalid.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorParameterOutOfBound**: A parameter value is outside of the acceptable boundary.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorRadioDisabled**: The NFC wireless radio on the device is disabled.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorSecurityViolation**: A security violation associated with the reader session has occurred.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorUnsupportedFeature**: The reader session does not support this feature.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorInvalidParameter**: An input parameter is invalid.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorParameterOutOfBound**: A parameter value is outside of the acceptable boundary.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorRadioDisabled**: The NFC wireless radio on the device is disabled.
- **NFCReaderError.Code.readerErrorSecurityViolation**: A security violation associated with the reader session has occurred.
